application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: 1 x English Oak (applicants ref no. T1860) - Reduce lateral extent of crown by 2-3m; 1 x Common Lime (applicants ref no. T1264) - Remove epicormic growth from base;1 x Common Lime (applicants ref no. T1008) & x 1 Ash (applicants ref no. T1009) - Remove debris and vegetation to allow inspection of base; 1 x Goat Willow (applicants ref no. T1448) - Pollard to previous pollard height at approximately 1.5m and removing 4 maturing limbs to reduce weight in crown; 1 x Sweet Chestnut (applicants ref no. T2449) - Reduce crown by 2-3m; 1 x London Plane (applicants ref no. T839) - Lift crown by 3-4m on SSW side; 1 x Horse Chestnut (applicants ref no. T1007) - Reduce crown by up to 2m;  1 x Horse Chestnut (applicants ref no. T7631) - Reduce height by 4m;  1 x Common Laburnum (applicants ref no. T7796) - Remove faulted/dead stem;  1 x English Oak (applicants ref no. T1703) - Reduce crown by approximately 2-3m;  1 x English Oak (applicants ref no. T1824) & 1 x False Acacia (applicants ref no. T1301) - Reduce crown by 3m;   1 x London Plane (applicants ref no. T7525) - Remove specified limb(s) in central crown with decay/woodpecker holes;  1 x Holm Oak (applicants ref no. T1277) - Remove suspended or broken limb(s) - lower crown North side;  1 x Blue Atlas Cedar (applicants ref no. T1259) - Remove suspended or broken limb(s) - throughout crown.  1 x English Oak (applicants ref no. T1861) - Reduce faulted stem(s) by 50%;  1 x Common Lime (applicants ref no. T1239) - Pollard to previous pollard height;  1 x English Oak (applicants ref no. T1362) - Reduce crown by up to 3m;  2 x Hornbeam (applicants ref no. T1070 & T1071) - Reduce height to 5m.
